entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
